quest.name: Help Me, Lord of the Dance
journal: When P'molminn approaches, beware, for the impetuous Miqo'te always leads a merry dance.

P'molminn the dancing girl aspires to a professional engagement at one of the grand balls. The legendary dancing master Guillaunaux is her only hope, and his whereabouts may be common knowledge among the uncommon set on the Steps of Thal.

The ladies who lunch─and loure─inform you that Master Guillaunaux is eminently desirable and soon to be unavailable. Unless you catch up to him at the Hustings Strip, he may well slip through P'molminn's slender fingers.
Master Guillaunaux proves less amenable to your overture than you had hoped. The only way to his heart─or even to something resembling a civil conversation─is to /dance for him on the Hustings Strip.

The tormented dancing master praises the rugged potential of your dance, whilst dismissing P'molminn's overseasoned steps with cutting cruelty. Yet the Miqo'te's grit and caprice carry the day, and it is the master and the adventurer who are left staring after the student who never was.
objectives: Ask about Guillaunaux on the Steps of Thal.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: Psst, you there! Yes, darlin', you. They say you're the lass with the brass. Well, they call me that too, but for a different reason.fellow to follow. Name's P'molminn, and I earn my keep as a dancing girl in these markets.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: Aye, it's a living─and a good one!─but it's not exactly what I set out to be when I bid farewell to the mudflats. I know, I know─isn't that the way the tail curls!

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: Still, I should like to be one of those dancers dexter. You know, the sort they engage for the grand balls. Mmm, to be a dancer of craft, not mere wiles...and keep company in high society!

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: 'Course, I'd have to learn a proper sort of dancing─less shimmy, more stately. And that's where you come in, darlin', because I've got a quarry for you to track down.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: They say a dancing master named Guillaunaux is in town. All the highborn ladies are aflutter wanting to take lessons with him. He's the best, that's the word!

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: This is my chance to be something finer than Minnie the Minx! Go to the Steps of Thal and ask around about him, won't you?

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: It's the dancing master Guillaunaux I need you to find. The fancy folk on the Steps of Thal, they're sure to know where he's about!

dialogue.name: WOMENA01427
dialogue.text: Master Guillaunaux? Oh, it's lovely what he teaches. But strait is the gate, my good ladysir─he is very choosy about whom he teaches.

dialogue.name: WOMENA01427
dialogue.text: You must dance for him and show some...innate quality. Why, he wouldn't even accept Master Gegeruju's diamond-crusted crumpet, and she was quite the danseuse already.

dialogue.name: WOMENA01427
dialogue.text: Rather a martinet, Master Guillaunaux. He deigned to teach my milk-sister, and it took her nigh on two years to master a single step. I wonder how you'd fare.

dialogue.name: SOSOTTA
dialogue.text: Oh, of course I know where Master Guillaunaux is. Don't you see these roses on my cheeks? And the ever–so–slight droop in my supple carriage? I've just come from practice!

dialogue.name: SOSOTTA
dialogue.text: You can stop wondering who the belle of the ball is to be next moon. With what Master Guillaunaux taught me, I've no doubt that I'll dazzle the masses!

dialogue.name: SOSOTTA
dialogue.text: Where can you find him? Well, I oughtn't say, but...oh, why not! You should find him on the Hustings Strip. He said he was headed to the airship landing.

dialogue.name: SOSOTTA
dialogue.text: If you hurry, you'll probably catch Master Guillaunaux on the Hustings Strip. He had some business or other at the airship landing.

dialogue.name: WOMENB01427
dialogue.text: Are you another one of Master Guillaunaux's camp followers? So cute. You know he's from Coerthas, don't you? Travels the world teaching the art of the dance...

dialogue.name: WOMENB01427
dialogue.text: They say he was the youngest dancing master ever to leap the lance. That he had a large estate, a fine stable, and a coat of crown sable. Why anyone would leave all that is beyond me.

dialogue.name: WOMENB01427
dialogue.text: When I think about that, it gives me shivers, you know? Why, if he weren't leaving Ul'dah today, I'd consider permitting him the pleasure of my person. Oh, don't look so shocked. Mayhap when he returns...

dialogue.name: WOMENB01427
dialogue.text: I suppose I must work on my dancing until he returns. You don't think he'd insist on an audition for arts other than dancing, do you? That would be tedious.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Master Guillaunaux? I am he. That you are an adventurer is apparent, but what business brings an adventurer to a dancing master, I wonder.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: At-tat! You will not answer where no question has been asked! It is the feet that must persuade, not the tongue. Now, dance for me!

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: If you will not dance, begone! I would no more speak with a stillfoot than I would dwell among tyrants!

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Plague me not if you have no dance to show me. I must leave this place ere long.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: The vessel is rude, but the wine within may yet be fined.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Unfortunately, there is much call on my time, and I am bound for another land. I will make a dancer of you when next I return to this city.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: There you are! Heard anything good? Hope you're not wasting time with that looker there.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text:
Oh... Oh!
M-Master Guillaunaux, I am P'molminn the dan...danseuse, and I would speak with you.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: It is my greatest desire to become a dancer dexter, and perform at a grand ball. Please, milord, won't you teach me?

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: So. It is not the adventurer who wishes to tread the parquet, but this stammering maiden.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Child, I sift people to find dancers. Do you understand? Then let us see whether you can master these steps!

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: <gulp> ...That's how they do it in high society, huh?

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: I can be the lass with class! Just watch!

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Hideous. Grotesque. Your dancing stands alongside the Calamity in its horror.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: W-Well! Those words might cow your highborn ladies, Master Guillaunaux, but where I come from, we take our lumps and keep on twirlin'! Now, what exactly didn't you like?

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Child, you rely overmuch on appearances. You go from pose to pose, pleasing to pleasing. That is not dance, but crude fascination.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Adventurer! Look sharp and take your turn on the floor.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: I...I can't take my eyes off of you!

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: I mean, you're not exactly good. You'd be picking rotten orange piths out of your eyebrows if you did that at the market, but...

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: It's...it's a story, isn't it? A dance is a story...and I have nothing to say.

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: Because I haven't lived...just made a living.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Aye, child. Ale-glazed eyes are easy to please, and you have squandered these years striking your poses when you could have learned a craft.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Still, you have courage, I'll warrant that. I weary of teaching so many who may have lived, but in ways too alike. I wonder if you have courage enough.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: Do you dare start anew? To be a dancing girl no longer─to learn a true craft?

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: I dare! I will learn the craft...of adventuring!

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: Do you adventure for fun or gain? Do you have to be very good with weapons? Those moves you make with your arms─is that some fighty thing!?

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: I want what you've got, darlin'! The way to the grand ball is through quests and dungeons. I'll learn to slog, I'll learn to slug...and I'll learn to dance!

dialogue.name: PMOLMINN
dialogue.text: Thank you, miladymilord, thank you! I'm off to the Adventurers' Guild. You've taught me so much, and I'll never forget that dance you showed me!

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: ...Did she choose a mere adventurer over me, master among masters?

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: My airship departs this strange city soon. Dance your rude yet puissant dance, adventurer. Mayhap you will affect more aspirants as you did P'molminn.

dialogue.name: GUILLAUNAUX
dialogue.text: ...Hah! And mayhap I shall hang up my dancing shoes and start anew!

dialogue.name: SYSTEM
dialogue.text: You have learned the emote Ball Dance!
